name: Leap Peasant
description:
Leap Peasant is a short platformer where you have to collect coins and reach the top! Leap and avoid falling down as you navigate through the different environments.

Controls

  • Walk: A/D (Joystick/D-Pad)
  • Jump: Space (A)

Credits

The game was created by Kevin in about 6 full time days (8 hours per day) over the course of 3 weeks.
